Dialogue.Page: It looks like Giant's Deep's clouds just disappeared somehow.
Not really sure when that happened, actually. It's been a bit hard to keep track of time recently, being in a time loop and whatnot.
Have you noticed anything else that's weird?

DialogueOption.Text: The water and tornadoes only appear when I fly into Giant's Deep!

Dialogue.Page: Huh. Maybe it's some weird quantum shenanigan.
Maybe they won't disappear if you leave your scout on the planet?

DialogueOption.Text: I might just have to try that.
Why are you so calm about this??

Dialogue.Page: For all I care, it's just nice being able to see the other planets in the sky for a change.
